{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-AC54U |revision= |asin= |series=AC1200 |est_release_date=02/2015 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MSQ-RTN54U |ic_id=3568A-RTN54U |pcb_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;3.0; |tp_firmware=Padavan |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS,ASUS_5G |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$,,,^ASUS_5G$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AC1200 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Router}} ''with two high-gain antennas and USB port'' :[http://www.asus.com/Networks/Wireless_Routers/RTAC54U/ Product page] ===Specifications=== * Product Segment: AC1200 (867+300 Mbps) * Antenna: 2x external detachable antennas * Operating Frequency: 2.4/5 GHz * Power Supply: external adapter : AC Input: 110~240V (50/60Hz) : DC Output: 12V with max. 1A current * Dimensions: 189 x 129 x 36 mm (WxDxH) ===Forum threads=== *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:62022-86#3003 On '''iXBT''' forums] (''{{TPFirmware|Padavan}}, RTN'' posts) :[[ASUS RT-AC54U]] = [[ASUS RT-N54U]] + 2T2R 802.11ac !! ==== [https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin/blob/master/release/src/router/rc/sysdeps/init-ralink.c RMerlin's Github] ==== {{SCollapse|config â€¢ >> |
		case MODEL_RTN11P:	/* fall through */
		case MODEL_RTN14U:	/* fall through */
		case MODEL_RTN54U:      /* fall through */
		case MODEL_RTAC54U:      /* fall through */
		case MODEL_RTN56UB1:      /* fall through */
		case MODEL_RTAC1200HP:  /* fall through */
		case MODEL_RTAC51U:	/* fall through */
		case MODEL_RTAC52U
}} ===See also=== *[[List of Padavan firmware supported devices]] *[http://www.asus.com/event/2014/network/ASUS_AC_family_chart/solutions.html Asus Wireless AC networking solutions] __NOTOC__
